name: windportal
description: Installation showing how the wind feels in a different location in the world.

scripts.generate: microflo generate --components ./node_modules/microflo-core/components --components ./node_modules/microflo-arduino/components --ignore-component LedChainNeoPixel --target=arduino --prepend-file config.h graphs/windportal.fbp build/windportal/windportal.ino
